languages.text: "Процедура 0-Х велит занять камеры магосам, чей индекс психической восприимчивости выше среднего. Те техножрецы, что заняли места в камерах, погрузились в блаженный инфосон, сквозь который поют бинарные гимны, весьма схожие с теми, что периодически возглашал варп-вокс Кубиса Дельфима. Производительность мануфакторумов упала — многие слуги Бога-Машины бросили посты и просят дать им исполнить долг перед Процедурой 0-Х, но блюстители взяли камеры под охрану и не подпускают к ним добровольцев".

"The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."
languages.original_text: "Процедура 0-Х велит занять камеры магосам, чей индекс психической восприимчивости выше среднего. Те техножрецы, что заняли места в камерах, погрузились в блаженный инфосон, сквозь который поют бинарные гимны, весьма схожие с теми, что периодически возглашал варп-вокс Кубиса Дельфима. Производительность мануфакторумов упала — многие слуги Бога-Машины бросили посты и просят дать им исполнить долг перед Процедурой 0-Х, но блюстители взяли камеры под охрану и не подпускают к ним добровольцев".

traits.locale_text: ""The 0-X procedure dictates the magos, whose psi-receptivity index is above average, to go into the cells. Those Tech-Priests who took their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream, where they listen to the binary hymns, that very similar to those that the warp-vox of Cubis Delphim has periodically cried out. The performance of the manufactories dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading to let them fulfil their duty to Procedure 0-X, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward the volunteers away from them."

""The 0-X procedure dictates the magos, whose psi-receptivity index is above average, to go into the cells. Those Tech-Priests who took their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream, where they listen to the binary hymns, that very similar to those that the warp-vox of Cubis Delphim has periodically cried out. The performance of the manufactories dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading to let them fulfil their duty to Procedure 0-X, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward the volunteers away from them."

The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

languages.text: “0-C程序命令灵能感应指数高于平均值的贤者接入指定隔间。那些进入单间的技术神甫潜入了至福的数据梦境，颂唱起了二进制赞美诗，这与库比斯·德尔菲姆的亚空间音阵广播发出的周期性声响颇为类似。制造工厂的效率有所下降，万机之神的许多仆人放弃了他们的岗位，恳求运行0-C程序，但执法者已经接管了那些房间，把那些志愿者从里面赶了出来。”
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

traits.locale_text: “0-C程序命令灵能感应指数高于平均值的贤者接入指定隔间。那些进入单间的技术神甫潜入了至福的数据梦境，颂唱起了二进制赞美诗，这与库比斯·德尔菲姆的亚空间音阵广播发出的周期性声响颇为类似。制造工厂的效率有所下降，万机之神的许多仆人放弃了他们的岗位，恳求运行0-C程序，但执法者已经接管了那些房间，把那些志愿者从里面赶了出来。”
“0-C程序命令灵能感应指数高于平均值的贤者接入指定单间。那些进入单间的技术神甫陷入了幸福的数据梦之中，他们在梦中聆听着二进制赞美诗，这与库比斯·德尔菲姆的亚空间扩音器周期性发出的声响颇为类似。制造工厂的效率有所下降，万机之神的许多仆人放弃了他们的岗位，恳求运行0-C程序，但执法者已经接管了那些房间，把那些志愿者从里面赶了出来。”

languages.text: «El Procedimiento 0-C ordena a los magos con un índice de receptividad psíquica superior a la media entrar en las celdas. Los tecnosacerdotes que ocupan sus asientos en ellas caen en un feliz datasueño y empiezan a cantar himnos binarios muy similares a los que emite periódicamente el voco de disformidad de Cubis Delphim. El rendimiento de los manufactorums ha caído, ya que muchos de los sirvientes del Dios Máquina han abandonado sus puestos y ruegan el privilegio de cumplir el Procedimiento 0-C, pero los guardias vigilan las celdas y evitan que los voluntarios entren en ellas».
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

traits.locale_text: «El Procedimiento 0-C ordena a los magos con un índice de receptividad psíquica superior a la media entrar en las celdas. Los tecnosacerdotes que ocupan sus asientos en ellas caen en un feliz datasueño y empiezan a cantar himnos binarios muy similares a los que emite periódicamente el voco de disformidad de Cubis Delphim. El rendimiento de los manufactorums ha caído, ya que muchos de los sirvientes del Dios Máquina han abandonado sus puestos y ruegan el privilegio de cumplir el Procedimiento 0-C, pero los guardias vigilan las celdas y evitan que los voluntarios entren en ellas».

languages.text: 「プロシージャー0-Cは、平均以上の超能力受容指数を有する賢人にセルに入るよう命じます。セルに座ったそれらの技術司祭たちは、至福のデータドリームに陥り、キュビス・デルフィムのヴォクスである<歪み>から定期的に流れてくるものによく似た2進法の賛美歌を歌い始めます。聖工場のパフォーマンスが低下し...機械神の従者の多くがその職を捨て、プロシージャー0-Cを遂行する特権を求めて嘆願している状態です。しかし、エンフォーサーがセルを預かり、志願者たちをセルから遠ざけています」
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

traits.locale_text: 「プロシージャー0-Xは、平均以上の超能力受容指数を有する賢人にセルに入るよう命じます。セルに座ったそれらの技術司祭たちは、至福のデータドリームに陥り、キュビス・デルフィムのヴォクスである<歪み>から定期的に流れてくるものによく似た2進法の賛美歌に聞き入っています。聖工場のパフォーマンスが低下し...機械神の従者の多くがその職を捨て、プロシージャー0-Xを遂行する特権を求めて嘆願している状態です。しかし、エンフォーサーがセルを預かり、志願者たちをセルから遠ざけています」

「プロシージャー0-Cは、平均以上の超能力受容指数を有する賢人にセルに入るよう命じます。セルに座ったそれらの技術司祭たちは、至福のデータドリームに陥り、キュビス・デルフィムのヴォクスである<歪み>から定期的に流れてくるものによく似た2進法の賛美歌に聞き入っています。聖工場のパフォーマンスが低下し...機械神の従者の多くがその職を捨て、プロシージャー0-Cを遂行する特権を求めて嘆願している状態です。しかし、エンフォーサーがセルを預かり、志願者たちをセルから遠ざけています」

languages.text: « Afin de pénétrer dans les cellules, la Procédure 0-C prend le contrôle des magi dotés d'un index de psyréceptivité supérieur à la moyenne. Les technoprêtres installés dans ces cellules sont alors plongés dans un merveilleux rêve numérique, où ils entonnent des hymnes binhaires très proches de ceux qui émanent périodiquement du Warp-vox de Cubis Delphim. La production des manufactorums a chuté. De nombreux serviteurs du Dieu-Machine ont abandonné leur poste et supplient qu'on les affecte à la Procédure 0-C, mais les prévôts montent la garde devant les cellules et tiennent les hordes de volontaires à l'écart. »
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

traits.locale_text: « Afin de pénétrer dans les cellules, la Procédure 0-C prend le contrôle des magi dotés d'un index de psyréceptivité supérieur à la moyenne. Les technoprêtres installés dans ces cellules sont alors plongés dans un merveilleux rêve numérique, où ils entonnent des hymnes binhaires très proches de ceux qui émanent périodiquement du Warp-vox de Cubis Delphim. La production des manufactorums a chuté. De nombreux serviteurs du Dieu-Machine ont abandonné leur poste et supplient qu'on les affecte à la Procédure 0-C, mais les prévôts montent la garde devant les cellules et tiennent les hordes de volontaires à l'écart. »

languages.text: "Die Prozedur 0-C befiehlt Magi mit überdurchschnittlichem psionischem Rezeptivitätsindex, sich in die Zellen zu begeben. Techpriester, die ihren Platz in den Zellen einnehmen, fallen in einen glückseligen Datentraum singen binhären Hymnen, die denen gleichen, die gelegentlich aus dem Warp-Vox von Cubis Delphim kamen. Die Leistung der Manufactorien ist rückläufig – viele der Diener des Maschinengotts haben ihre Posten verlassen und flehen um das Privileg, Prozedur 0-C erfüllen zu dürfen. Doch die Enforcer haben die Kontrolle über die Zellen übernehmen und halten diese Freiwilligen von ihnen fern."
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Prozedur 0-C befiehlt Magi mit überdurchschnittlichem psionischem Rezeptivitätsindex, sich in die Zellen zu begeben. Techpriester, die ihren Platz in den Zellen einnehmen, fallen in einen glückseligen Datentraum singen binhären Hymnen, die denen gleichen, die gelegentlich aus dem Warp-Vox von Cubis Delphim kamen. Die Leistung der Manufactorien ist rückläufig – viele der Diener des Maschinengotts haben ihre Posten verlassen und flehen um das Privileg, Prozedur 0-C erfüllen zu dürfen. Doch die Enforcer haben die Kontrolle über die Zellen übernehmen und halten diese Freiwilligen von ihnen fern."

"Die Prozedur 0-C befiehlt Magi mit überdurchschnittlichem Psi-Rezeptivitätsindex, sich in die Zellen zu begeben. Techpriester, die ihren Platz in den Zellen einnehmen, fallen in einen glückseligen Datentraum. In diesem lauschen sie binhären Hymnen ganz ähnlich wie denen, die gelegentlich aus dem Warp-Vox von Cubis Delphim kamen. Die Leistung der Manufactorien ist zurückgegangen — viele der Diener des Maschinengotts haben ihre Posten verlassen und flehen um das Privileg, Prozedur 0-C erfüllen zu dürfen. Doch die Enforcers haben die Kontrolle über die Zellen übernehmen und halten diese Freiwilligen von ihnen fern."

languages.text: "0-C Sayılı Prosedür, ortalamanın üstünde ruhsezi idrakine sahip Magosların hücrelere girmesini buyuruyor. Hücrelerdeki yerlerini alan Tekno Rahipler, saadetli veri düşlerine dalarak Cubis Delphim'in öteboyut voksundan düzenli aralıklarla çalınanlara oldukça benzer ikilidil ilahiler söylüyorlar. Manufaktorumların verimi düştü. Makine Tanrı'nın hizmetkârlarından birçoğu vazifelerini terk etmiş, 0-C Sayılı Prosedür'ü uygulama şerefine ermek için yalvarıyor. Ancak infazcılar, hücrelere el koyup bu gönüllüleri uzaklaştırmış durumda."
languages.original_text: "The 0-C Procedure commands Magi with an above average psy-receptivity index to enter the cells. Those Tech-Priests who take their seats in the cells fall into a blissful datadream and begin to sing binharic hymns very similar to those that periodically whirred from the warp vox of Cubis Delphim. The performance of the manufactorums has dropped — many of the Machine God's servants have abandoned their posts and are pleading for the privilege of fulfilling Procedure 0-C, but the enforcers have taken custody of the cells and ward these volunteers away from them."
